    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">macOS 和 Windows 操作系统下如何安装和启动 MySQL / Redis 数据库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>你好，我是 Kagol，个人公众号：<code>前端开源星球</code>（欢迎关注我，分享更多前端开源知识）。</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/opentiny/tiny-pro" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">TinyPro</a> 后台管理系统的 NestJS 后端依赖 MySQL 和 Redis 数据库，本文主要带大家安装和启动 MySQL 和 Redis 数据库。</p>
<h2 id="macos">macOS</h2>
<p>如果你使用的是 macOS 操作系统，安装 MySQL 和 Redis 数据库将变得非常简单，只需要一行命令即可。</p>
<h3 id="mysql">MySQL</h3>
<p>安装 MySQL：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew install mysql
</code></pre>
<p>查看是否安装成功：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ mysql --version
mysql  Ver 9.2.0 for macos13.7 on x86_64 (Homebrew)
</code></pre>
<p>启动 MySQL：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew services start mysql
==&gt; Successfully started `mysql` (label: homebrew.mxcl.mysql)
</code></pre>
<p>连接 MySQL 数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ mysql -u root -p
</code></pre>
<p>退出 MySQL 终端：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; exit
Bye
</code></pre>
<p>停止数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew services stop mysql
Stopping `mysql`... (might take a while)
==&gt; Successfully stopped `mysql` (label: homebrew.mxcl.mysql)
</code></pre>
<h3 id="redis">Redis</h3>
<p>得益于 macOS 的 Homebrew 软件包管理器，Redis 数据库的安装和启动和 MySQL 一样简单。</p>
<p>安装 Redis：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew install redis
</code></pre>
<p>查看 Redis 是否安装成功：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ redis-cli --version
redis-cli 7.2.7
</code></pre>
<p>启动 Redis：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew services start redis
==&gt; Successfully started `redis` (label: homebrew.mxcl.redis)
</code></pre>
<p>验证是否启动成功：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ redis-cli
127.0.0.1:6379&gt; ping
PONG
127.0.0.1:6379&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>退出 Redis 终端：</p>
<pre><code>127.0.0.1:6379&gt; exit
</code></pre>
<p>停止 Redis：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ brew services stop redis
Stopping `redis`... (might take a while)
==&gt; Successfully stopped `redis` (label: homebrew.mxcl.redis)
</code></pre>
<h2 id="windows">Windows</h2>
<p>如果你使用的是 Windows 操作系统，你需要先下载 MySQL 和 Redis 对应的软件包。</p>
<h3 id="mysql-1">MySQL</h3>
<p>下载软件包：<a href="https://downloads.mysql.com/archives/installer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://downloads.mysql.com/archives/installer/</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/296720/202504/296720-20250412112657370-1193422765.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击文件：<code>mysql-installer-community-8.0.40.0.msi</code> 进行安装。</p>
<p>安装完成之后，在终端中执行以下命令连接数据库。</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ mysql -u root -p
</code></pre>
<h3 id="redis-1">Redis</h3>
<p>下载软件包：<a href="https://github.com/redis-windows/redis-windows/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/redis-windows/redis-windows/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/296720/202504/296720-20250412112649361-1593084705.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将文件：<code>Redis-7.4.2-Windows-x64-cygwin.zip</code> 进行解压。</p>
<p>点击文件：<code>redis-server.exe</code> 即可启动 Redis，不需要安装。</p>

<h2 id="附录mysql-数据库基本操作">附录：MySQL 数据库基本操作</h2>
<p>显示所有数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; show databases;
+--------------------+
| Database           |
+--------------------+
| demo_tiny_pro      |
| information_schema |
| mysql              |
| order_sys          |
| performance_schema |
| sys                |
+--------------------+
6 rows in set (0.09 sec)
</code></pre>
<p>创建数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; create database order_sys;
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.01 sec)
</code></pre>
<p>删除数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; drop database order_sys;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.01 sec)
</code></pre>
<p>使用数据库：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; use order_sys;
Reading table information for completion of table and column names
You can turn off this feature to get a quicker startup with -A

Database changed
</code></pre>
<p>显示当前数据库下的所有数据表：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; show tables;
+---------------------+
| Tables_in_order_sys |
+---------------------+
| lang                |
| menu                |
| order               |
| permission          |
| role                |
| role_menu           |
| role_permission     |
| user                |
| user_role           |
+---------------------+
9 rows in set (0.00 sec)
</code></pre>
<p>从数据表中查询数据：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">mysql&gt; select id,name from menu;
+----+---------------+
| id | name          |
+----+---------------+
|  1 | Board         |
|  2 | Home          |
|  3 | Work          |
|  4 | List          |
|  5 | Table         |
|  6 | Form          |
|  7 | Base          |
|  8 | Step          |
|  9 | Profile       |
| 10 | Detail        |
+----+---------------+
10 rows in set (0.00 sec)
</code></pre>
